title: Phishing URL
summary: This link may attempt to steal credentials by imitating a trusted site.
tips: Don't enter passwords on unfamiliar sites.
Check the domain carefully for misspellings (typosquatting).
Hover the link to preview the destination before clicking.
details: This URL contains patterns commonly used in phishing such as deceptive domains and redirect chains. Example: 'paypa1.com' instead of 'paypal.com'.

title: Malicious attachment
summary: The file contains indicators of malicious behaviour (executable or macro).
tips: Scan attachments in an antivirus or sandbox before opening.
Prefer viewing attachments in a safe viewer or ask the sender to re-send via trusted channels.
details: Attachments with macros or embedded executables are a common infection vector.
